item.title: 哈德逊河2025年贸易收入预计将创下123亿美元的纪录
item.description: 做市商公司哈德逊河交易公司的交易收入在2025年攀升至创纪录水平，波动的市场助推了全球范围内这些撮合买卖双方的公司业绩。【原文：Trading revenue at market-making firm Hudson River Trading rose in 2025 toward a record level as volatile markets helped lift results globally for companies that step in to match buyers and sellers.】

item.title: 沃伯格考虑以10亿美元出售伦敦保险经纪公司麦吉尔
item.description: 据知情人士透露，华平投资正考虑出售英国保险经纪公司McGill and Partners。【原文：Warburg Pincus is considering a possible sale of UK insurance broker McGill and Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Bitpanda据悉正筹备于2026年上半年在法兰克福上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，由亿万富翁彼得·蒂尔支持的加密货币交易平台Bitpanda GmbH正筹备于今年上半年在法兰克福证券交易所首次公开募股。【原文：Bitpanda GmbH, a cryptocurrency trading platform backed by billionaire Peter Thiel, is gearing up for a Frankfurt initial public offering as soon as the first half of this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 市政债券开年表现强劲，"一月效应"显现
item.description: 市政债券以强劲态势开启2026年，所谓"一月效应"推高价格，再投资资金正大量涌入市场。【原文：Municipal bonds are starting 2026 on strong footing, with the so-called “January effect” lifting prices as reinvestment cash floods the market.】

item.title: 摩根大通、花旗正商讨为阿根廷10亿美元输油管道项目提供融资
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，包括摩根大通公司和花旗集团在内的一批银行正商讨向阿根廷天然气生产商提供约10亿美元贷款，用于建设一条横贯全国的天然气管道。【原文：A group of banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Citigroup Inc. are in talks to lend natural gas producers in Argentina roughly $1 billion to build a cross-country pipeline, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉支持的CI收购景顺加拿大基金资产
item.description: 总部位于亚特兰大的景顺有限公司正将其价值260亿加元（约合187亿美元）的加拿大投资基金业务出售给CI全球资产管理公司，此举进一步推动了该国共同基金行业的并购趋势。【原文：Atlanta-based Invesco Ltd. is selling its C$26 billion ($18.7 billion) Canadian investment fund business to CI Global Asset Management, furthering the M&A trend in the country’s mutual fund industry.】

item.title: 惠灵顿聘请汉密尔顿·莱恩的亚历克斯·贝姆推动二级市场业务
item.description: 以股票和债券选择闻名的共同基金巨头惠灵顿管理公司聘请了汉密尔顿莱恩公司的亚历克斯·贝姆，领导其进军私募股权股权买卖的热门市场。【原文：Wellington Management Co., the mutual fund giant best known for stock- and bond-picking, hired Hamilton Lane Inc.’s Alex Behm to lead its foray into the hot market of buying and selling private equity stakes.】

item.title: 法国班尼杰集团称正与All3Media洽谈组建电视巨头
item.description: 法国媒体集团Banijay Group NV表示，正就将其电视制作业务与竞争对手All3Media Ltd.合并进行谈判，此举有望打造一家娱乐巨头，旗下拥有众多热门节目。【原文：French media group Banijay Group NV said it is in talks to merge its TV production business with rival All3Media Ltd., potentially creating an entertainment powerhouse with a string of hit shows on its roster.】

item.title: 柯克兰律师事务所被指在私募股权纠纷中存在利益冲突
item.description: 柯克兰律师事务所卷入了一场纠纷，该纠纷涉及Ascent Resources的投资者与一家私募股权公司——后者正试图筹集续期基金以延长其对这家天然气生产商的控制权。【原文：Law firm Kirkland & Ellis has been drawn into a dispute between investors of Ascent Resources and the private equity firm that’s seeking to raise a continuation fund to prolong its hold on the natural gas producer.】

item.title: 美国生物科技股销售创2021年以来最大首周涨幅
item.description: 2026年，美国股市制药企业股票销售开局强劲，提振了生物技术行业融资前景——该领域去年曾经历动荡。【原文：Stock sales from drug developers are off to a flying start on US exchanges in 2026, boosting the prospects for biotechnology fundraising after turbulence in the sector last year.】

item.title: 新西兰住宅建筑成本在第四季度回升
item.description: 新西兰第四季度住宅建筑成本创15个月来最大涨幅，建筑业开始复苏。【原文：New Zealand home-building costs increased the most in 15 months in the fourth quarter as the construction industry begins to recover.】

item.title: 人工智能的生产力潜力从未如此显而易见
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 贝宁聘请花旗、摩根大通等银行研究发行债券事宜
item.description: 贝宁已聘请多家国际银行，为其潜在发行的美元计价伊斯兰债券及其他债务证券进行安排。【原文：Benin has hired a group of international banks to arrange the potential sale of a dollar-denominated Sukuk bond and other debt securities.】

item.title: 特朗普格陵兰言论致丹麦克朗逼近干预区间
item.description: 围绕美国总统特朗普对格陵兰岛计划的不确定性，已推动丹麦克朗跌至六年低点，加剧了市场对央行将出手干预以支撑本币的猜测。【原文：Uncertainty around US President Donald Trump’s plans for Greenland has helped push the Danish krone to its weakest in six years, fueling speculation the central bank will step in to support it.】

item.title: 安大略省公用事业公司筹备2.5亿加元首次债券发行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，安大略省一家公用事业公司正准备最早于本周三通过首次债券发行筹集约2.5亿加元（合1.8亿美元）。【原文：An Ontario utility is preparing to raise around C$250 million ($180 million) in an inaugural debt deal as soon as Wednesday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 基础设施管理公司AIP新基金首轮募集20亿欧元
item.description: 能源转型与基础设施管理公司AIP Management在最新旗舰基金的首轮关闭中筹集了约20亿欧元（23亿美元）。【原文：AIP Management, an energy transition and infrastructure manager, has raised about €2 billion ($2.3 billion) at the first close of its latest flagship fund.】

item.title: 非洲产油国债券领涨，布伦特原油因伊朗紧张局势飙升
item.description: 随着布伦特原油价格上涨，非洲主要产油国引领新兴市场债券行情走高，此轮涨势源于美国对伊朗施压不断升级。【原文：Africa’s top oil producers led a bond rally across emerging markets as the price of brent crude rose, fueled by the US escalating pressure against Iran.】

item.title: 波音力压空客，自2018年以来首度夺得喷气式飞机销售冠军
item.description: 波音公司在2025年售出的喷气式飞机数量超过空客公司，结束了连续七年的销量低迷。这家美国飞机制造商正从一系列悲剧和企业危机中复苏。【原文：Boeing Co. sold more jets than Airbus SE in 2025, ending a seven-year losing streak as the US planemaker rallies from a period of tragedies and corporate crises.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒市值突破3000亿美元，人工智能热潮推升股价
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司股价延续强劲涨势，市场押注这家工业巨头的人工智能前景推动其市值首次突破3000亿美元大关。【原文：Caterpillar Inc. shares extended a turbocharged rally fueled by bets on the industrial giant’s artificial intelligence prospects to push its market valuation above $300 billion for the first time.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划发行3.52亿美元绿色债券用于气候项目
item.description: 尼日利亚计划今年通过发行绿色债券筹集高达5000亿奈拉（约合3.52亿美元），借此满足投资者强劲需求。作为非洲最大产油国，该国正转向气候相关债券融资，以支持环保项目并实现融资渠道多元化。【原文：Nigeria plans to raise as much as 500 billion naira ($352 million) through green bonds this year, tapping strong investor appetite as Africa’s biggest oil producer turns to climate-linked debt to fund environmental projects and diversify its financing base.】

item.title: 对冲基金安森押注加拿大房地产市场，此前已屡获胜绩
item.description: 安森基金管理公司对加拿大房地产市场持乐观态度，其旗舰基金去年因在部分住房投资中获利颇丰，回报率翻倍至21.2%。【原文：Anson Funds Management is bullish on Canada’s real estate market after its flagship fund doubled its returns to 21.2% last year, thanks to big wins on some of its housing bets.】

item.title: 美联储的穆萨莱姆表示，当前利率水平足以应对双向风险
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托·穆萨莱姆表示，通胀风险正在缓解，他预计物价将在今年晚些时候开始趋向央行目标水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said inflation risks are moderating, and he expects prices to begin converging toward the central bank’s target later this year.】

item.title: 道达尔能源首席执行官呼应埃克森美孚对委内瑞拉石油的谨慎态度
item.description: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官帕特里克·普亚尼表示，重振委内瑞拉石油产业将耗时数年且耗资数十亿美元，这将限制该国在2026年对全球市场的影响。【原文：Reviving Venezuela’s oil industry will take years and cost billions of dollars, limiting the country’s impact on global markets in 2026, according to TotalEnergies SE boss Patrick Pouyanne.】

item.title: 普丁没收其俄罗斯资产后，岩棉公司股价暴跌
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京下令没收这家丹麦公司在俄资产后，Rockwool A/S在哥本哈根股市遭遇近五个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Rockwool A/S fell the most in almost five months in Copenhagen after President Vladimir Putin ordered the seizure of the Danish company’s Russian assets.】

item.title: Adobe分析师转为2013年以来最悲观，人工智能威胁迫近
item.description: 对Adobe公司将在人工智能时代举步维艰的担忧，已使华尔街分析师对这家面向创意专业人士的软件制造商的看法降至十余年来最悲观水平。【原文：Concern that Adobe Inc. will struggle in the artificial-intelligence era has driven Wall Street analysts’ view on the maker of software for creative professionals to its most pessimistic in more than a dozen years.】

item.title: 苏格兰计划对价值超100万英镑的住宅征收房产税
item.description: 苏格兰政府计划在2028年前为最昂贵的房产引入两个新的市政税等级，同时提高低收入者缴纳所得税的起征点。【原文：The Scottish government plans to introduce two new council tax bands by 2028 for the most expensive properties while raising the threshold at which lower earners pay income tax.】

item.title: 美国新屋销售量在九月增长后基本持平
item.description: 美国10月新房销售量基本持平，此前9月曾出现增长，当时开发商通过降价和优惠措施吸引了焦虑的购房者。【原文：Sales of new homes in the US were little changed in October after advancing a month earlier as builders lured anxious customers with price cuts and incentives.】

item.title: 瑞士寻求通过修订提案确立现金地位
item.description: 瑞士政府支持在3月全民公投前将现金写入宪法，但其措辞与那些致力于保障实物货币地位的倡议者有所不同。【原文：Switzerland’s government backs enshrining cash in the constitution before a national vote in March, but with wording that differs from that of campaigners seeking to safeguard the status of physical money.】

item.title: 印度敦促闪购企业终止十分钟送达服务
item.description: 印度正要求快速电商企业取消其10分钟送达承诺，因外界日益担忧这种超紧迫的时限正恶化零工经济从业者的安全与工作条件。【原文：India is asking quick commerce companies to drop their 10-minute delivery promise amid mounting concerns that the ultra-tight deadlines are worsening safety and working conditions for gig workers.】

item.title: 鲁比尼认为人工智能热潮将抵消从特朗普到地缘政治的风险
item.description: 连努里尔·鲁比尼最近也开始唱多。【原文：Even Nouriel Roubini is sounding bullish these days.】
